original: Löfgren, Nils Gustaf, jur. kand., grosshandlare, Halmstad, f. 11/9/03 i Gbg av dir. Edw. L. o. Tora Synnerdahl. G. 36 m. Karin Kjellman. Barn: Nils Gunnar f. 37, Klas Edward 40, Kerstin Da.gmar 43, Pehr Hilding 47. — Stud:ex. i Halmstad 22 jur. kand. i Upps. 28. Res. t. Norge, Danm., Engl., Frankr., Holl., Tyskl., Tjeckoslov., Ung., Österr. o. Ital. Tingstjänstgöring i Nordmarks doms. 28-3’l, bitr. länsnotarie i Värmlands län 31-33, souschef i A-B Löfgren & Jöns’Son i Halmstad sed. 33. Led. av styr. f. Skåne-Hall. sockerengros fören. m. fl. branschorg., f. A-B Smål. Banks avd:kont. i Halmstad m. m., kommunalman, led. av stadsfullm. o. oHka ndr, ordf. i hyresnd 43, sekr. i fören. Gamla Halmstad o. red. f. dess årsbok. Skr,: Äldre konsistorieprot etc. (i Gbgs nat. skriftser. 27), art. i dags- o. fackpress. Hobby: släktforskning.
translated: Löfgren, Nils Gustaf, jurist, merchant, Halmstad, born on September 11, 1903 in Gothenburg to director Edward L. and Tora Synnerdahl. Married in 1936 to Karin Kjellman. Children: Nils Gunnar, born in 1937, Klas Edward, born in 1940, Kerstin Dagmar, born in 1943, Pehr Hilding, born in 1947. Completed secondary school in Halmstad in 1922 and obtained a law degree from Uppsala University in 1928. Traveled to Norway, Denmark, England, France, the Netherlands, Germany, Czechoslovakia, Hungary, Austria, and Italy. Worked as a judicial officer in Nordmark's district from 1928-1931, assistant county clerk in Värmland County from 1931-1933, and deputy manager at A-B Löfgren & Jöns'Son in Halmstad since 1933. Member of the board of directors of Skåne-Halland Sugar Wholesale Association and other industry organizations. Works at the branch office of A-B Smål. Bank in Halmstad, holds various municipal positions, member of the city council and the housing board, chairman of the rent committee since 1943, secretary of the association Gamla Halmstad and editor of its yearbook. Writings: Äldre konsistorieprot etc. (in Gothenburg's national publication series in 1927), articles in daily and professional press. Hobby: genealogy.
